data.enText: an amount of money that is paid to sb for the work they have done

tr: the act of paying for goods or services or to recompense for losses

example: he wasted his pay on drink
they saved a quarter of all their earnings

example.ex: ...the continuing marked increase in the remuneration of the company's directors...
example.tran: 公司董事薪酬的持续显著增长

value.def: Someone's remuneration is the amount of money that they are paid for the work that they do.
